FindingName: Do Not Bypass the Safe Links Feature
Description: In Exchange, it is possible to create mail transport rules that bypass the Safe Links detection capability. The rules listed above bypass the Safe Links capability. Consider revie1wing these rules, as bypassing the Safe Links capability even for a subset of senders should be considered dangerous.
Remediation: Navigate to the Mail Flow -> Rules screen in the Exchange Admin Center. Look for the offending rules and begin the process of assessing who created them and whether they are necessary to the continued function of your organization. If they are not, remove the rules.
